title.description: The main heading on the left

right.description: Whether or not to display the content on the right

show-line.description: Whether to display the vertical bar on the left

font-size.description: The font size of the main heading

bold.description: Whether the main title is bold

sub-color.description: The color of the subtitle on the right (the right arrow is the same color)
sub-color.description_zh: 右边副标题的颜色(右箭头同此颜色)

line-color.description: The color of the vertical line on the left is the same as the color parameter value by default
line-color.description_zh: 左边竖线的颜色，默认同color参数值

arrow.description: Whether or not to display the right arrow

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the content on the right side of the component is clicked, it is used to jump to "More"
events.description_zh: 组件右侧的内容被点击时触发，用于跳转"更多"

slots.name: right
slots.description: Customize the content on the right
